name: Runic Visard
text: You can carry two additional "Orb" items.

name: Shoes of Ataraxy
text: At the beginning of a round, after al ability cards have been revealed gain %game.condition.invisible%

name: Magnetic Relocator
text: During your turn perform "%game.action.teleport% 5". This Teleport must end in a hex containing a treasure tile or money token.

name: Shepherd's Flute
text: Summon Harrower Swarm ^flying^

name: Tyrannical Staff
text: During your rangedAttack ability, place your character token on one of the target of the attack. That enemy loses %game.action.fly% after the attack.

name: Crushing Mace
text: During your melee attack ability, add +2 %game.action.attack% and %game.condition.stun% to one attack.

name: Chief's Garb
text: Remove one %game.attackmodifier.minus2% modifier card from your modifier deck.

name: Iridescent Bracer
text: When attacked, you may %game.element.consume.ice% to gain %game.action.shield% 1 for the attack and flip this card over.

name: Talo's Staff
text: During your Heal, ability targeting Self, affect one ally within %game.action.range:3% instead.

name: Mask of Cruelty
text: When you are adjacent to two or more enemies gain %game.action.retaliate% 1.

name: Staff of Equilibrium
text: When damaged by an attack perform a "%game.action.heal% X, %game.action.range:3%" ability after the attack, where X is the damage you suffered.

name: Voyager's Blade
text: During your melee Attack ability, before modifiers are draw, add +2 %game.action.attack% to one attack if your first modifier drawn is positive.

name: Looking Glass
text: During your turn, add +1 %game.action.range% to your next ranged ability.

name: Runic Boots of Travel
text: During your Move ability, perform a %game.action.teleport% ability of equal value instead.

name: Battle Standard
text: During your turn, one ally within %game.action.range:2% may perform "%game.action.attack% 2".

name: Matriarch's Warhorn
text: During your turn, you and all allies within %game.action.range:2% gain %game.condition.strengthen%, an all enemies within %game.action.range:2% gain %game.condition.muddle%.

name: Dawnbloom Nectar
text: During your heal ability, add BLESS $bless$, or EMPOWER $empower$, EMPOWER $empower$, EMPOWER $empower$ to a single heal.

name: Graveweed Extract
text: During your Attack ability, add %game.condition.curse%, or ENFEEBLE $enfeeble$, ENFEEBLE $enfeeble$, ENFEEBLE $enfeeble$ to a one attack.

name: Crystal Spike
text: During your melee Attack ability, add %game.condition.pierce% 1 and %game.condition.wound% to one attack.

name: Arcbolt Lance
text: During your melee Attack ability, add %game.condition.wound% and %game.condition.muddle% to one attack.  You may consue %game.card.lost% this item instead to gain ADD TARGET $target$.

name: Scroll of Evasion
text: During your turn perform "DODGE $dodge$, %game.action.range:5%".

name: Arcstone Greaves
text: At the beginning of a round, after all ability cards have been revealed, change your leading initiative value to 100-X where X is the initiative value of your leading card.

name: Arclight Hood
text: You are immune to %game.condition.immobilize%, even if this item is spent.  When attacked, the attacker gains Disadvantage on the attack and gain DODGE $dodge$ after the attack.

name: Talo's Rosary
text: During your turn, remove negative condition from Self and perform "%game.action.heal% 3, Self". This can be used while you have %game.condition.stun%.

name: Dynamic Sickle
text: During your melee Attack ability, %game.element.consume.wild% to add +2 %game.action.attack% and %game.condition.muddle% to one attack.

name: Predator's Wristblade
text: After you kill an enemy during your turn, gain two "%Rage%" ^TOA6^ cards.
